trans-unit.source: Enumerates values for lengths of <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmphasisBreak" name="EmphasisBreak" href=""></xref> between spoken words.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的長度<xref uid="langword_csharp_EmphasisBreak" name="EmphasisBreak" href=""></xref>之間所說的文字。

trans-unit.source: The break emphasis is set for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: 中斷強調設定<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>透過<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A><xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState><xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A><xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>的執行個體上的屬性</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>所傳回的物件</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>上屬性</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A></xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>的執行個體

trans-unit.source: Each synthetic speech engine is free to determine how to render breaks between words; the nature of emphasis differs between languages, dialects, genders, or voices.
trans-unit.target: 每個綜合語音引擎就可以決定如何呈現文字; 之間的中斷強調的本質不同語言、 方言、 性別或語音。

trans-unit.source: Both EmphasisBreak and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> may be used when setting or getting the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instance.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個 EmphasisBreak 和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>時設定或取得可能需要使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>上<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>執行個體。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>

trans-unit.source: The two values may be distinguished by the fact that the actual values of EmphasisBreak are all less than zero and values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> are greater than or equal to zero; and by using the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance.
trans-unit.target: 事實，EmphasisBreak 的實際值都小於零和值的區別在於兩個值<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>會大於或等於零，與使用的值<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>傳回<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>所傳回物件<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>執行個體上的屬性。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>
